channel.title: Server hosting?
channel.description: ok ive been checking on dedicated server and one was like 69$ a month for 320gb of space how much gbs would i need to hold 200ppl without lag? so i could sell the rest of the space off for money. also were would i sell the gbs of space?

item.title: Server hosting?
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Private servers don’t tend to use alot of bandwith or space. I played RS for about 7 hours in low quality and I only used 20 mb of bandwith. You wouldn’t need much space anyway for the server files.

But I wouldn’t personally spend alot of money on server hosting yet I would start small and work your way up. Because who want’s to spend $50+ for a few users a day on hosting?
I would start with a 20 gig bandwith plan first and if you fail to use up most of that bandwith just change your plan a bit and slowly you will work out the best plan for you.

Hoped I’ve helped a bit.

Read full topic
